EmailTemplate.description: Respond to customer that they've been added to their company profile and now have the appropriate entitlement access.
EmailTemplate.name: Pubs Access Approved
EmailTemplate.subject: BendixKing Publication Request {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting BendixKing Technical Publications.
We have updated your profile and you now have access to the requested publication.
If you have any more questions, please feel free to contact us.
Thank you,
BendixKing Technical Publications Team pubs@bendixking.com Access our Publications online at myaerospace.com
{!EmailMessage.TextBody}
